definitions.definition: Concerned with the interests of others more than one's own; community - minded .

Of spatial representations : linked to a reference frame based on the external environment and independent of one's current location in it (for example, giving a direction as " north " as opposed to " right ").
Of a tourist : tending to be adventurous and preferring novel and unfamiliar experiences .

main_definition: Concerned with the interests of others more than one's own; community - minded . [from early 20th c.]
secondary_definitions: Of spatial representations : linked to a reference frame based on the external environment and independent of one's current location in it (for example, giving a direction as " north " as opposed to " right ").
( also tourism ) Of a tourist : tending to be adventurous and preferring novel and unfamiliar experiences .
